title: Feeling run down? Achy? Chills?
description: Oscillo is a flu medicine that reduces the duration and severity of flu symptoms. It is non-drowsy and does not interact with other medicine.
cleaned_text: Feeling run down? Achy? Chills? About Oscillo® Trusted for nearly 80 years, Oscillococcinum continues to be a convenient and reliable first choice for relief of flu-like symptoms. It has been shown in clinical studies to help reduce both the duration and severity of flu-like symptoms, such as body aches, headache, fever, chills, and fatigue.* Oscillococcinum is non-drowsy and recommended for everyone ages 2 and up. How to Stay Healthy During Flu Season Oscillococcinum relieves flu-like symptoms when taken at the first signs of flu, but there's a lot you can do to reduce or slow your chances of infection. Follow these simple tips to safeguard your health during flu season. Reviews I have been using Oscillococcinum for my pediatric and adult patients for the last 10 years, as well as for myself and my family. It is hands down, my favorite over-the-counter medicine. It really brought back joy with treating my patients because it feels great to be able to alleviate your patients suffering from flu and flu-like symptoms. I had chills but was I burning up; my entire body felt like I had been in a wreck, runny nose, congested coughing. I went to Walgreens picked Oscillococcinum up and started my first dose last night. I don't even feel like the same person this morning. Considering how high copays are, I'm glad this worked out for me. We have used this product for over 15 years, and it has always helped lessen the symptoms and duration of the flu. This is the first year I can't find Oscillo ANYWHERE! I guess the secret is out. Please get it back in stock before we actually need it!
